def calculate_max_pushpa_height(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, heights) = case
        max_height = max(heights)
        max_count = heights.count(max_height)
        max_pushpa_height = max_height + max_count + 1
        results.append(max_pushpa_height)
    return results

def calculate_max_pushpa_height(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, heights) = case
        max_height = max(heights)
        max_count = heights.count(max_height)
        max_pushpa_height = (max_height + max_count) * 1
        results.append(max_pushpa_height)
    return results

def calculate_max_pushpa_height(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, heights) = case
        max_height = max(heights)
        max_count = heights.count(max_height)
        max_pushpa_height = max_height - max_count - 1
        results.append(max_pushpa_height)
    return results

def calculate_max_pushpa_height(test_cases):
    results = []
    for case in test_cases:
        (N, heights) = case
        max_height = max(heights)
        max_count = heights.count(max_height)
